pageProduct.name: SUP Hair Skin & Nails 60 Gummies
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hair growing, Collagen nourishing & nail loving blend for that glow from within.

BEAUTY BEGINS WITHIN
Between sun, sea and styling our hair, skin & nails rarely cut a break. While hair masks and facials will certainly do their bit, if you're missing key nutrients to support healthy hair, skin & nails, that glow you're after may never be. Our all-time favourite glow-from-within heroes are Biotin, Zinc and Vitamin C.

WHY CHEW SUP?
Chew your supplements with SUP's delish gummies. SUP Hair, Skin & Nails has a broad-spectrum of nutrients to get you that glow from within. SUP contains Biotin, Vitamin C and Zinc to help:

- Support Collagen production
- Support hair growth and thickness
- Support skin elasticity and firmness
- Reduce brittle and splitting nails CHEWSUP

Size: 60 Pastilles

KEY FEATURES

• Collagen production
• Support hair growth and thickness
• Support skin elasticity and firmness
• Reduce brittle and splitting nails
• 99% Sugar Free
• Vegan Friendly

Warnings

"If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 micrograms retinol equivalents for woman and 900 micrograms retinol equivalents for men. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing. Reseal immediately after use.

Products containing maltitol and mannitol (3.75g per 2 pastilles) may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea."

Ingredients

Pyridoxine hydrochloride 1.36 mg
Equiv. to pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) 1.21 mg
dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate (Vitamin E 9.6 IU) 14.3 mg
Potassium iodide 78.54 mcg
Equiv. to Iodine 60 mcg
Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) 560 mcg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 160IU) 4 mcg
Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 4 mcg
Folic acid 176 mcg
Biotin 3.2 mg
Retinol acetate 275.255 mcg
Equiv. to Vitamin A 240 mcg RE
Zinc (as gluconate) 4 mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 32mg
Choline bitartrate 1.98 mg
Equiv. to Choline 800 mcg

Contains: CONTAINS MALTITOL AND MANNITOL

Directions

Adults only.
If you are pregnant - or considering becoming pregnant - do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor. When taken in excess of 3000 micrograms retinol equivalents - Vitamin A can cause birth defects.

Take 1-2 gummies daily, or as directed by your health professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25oC
